textile.author: walter_prindle
textile.post: I find that “provided one accepts a medieval date of manufacture” comment interesting. You have had several more years to perfect the process and produce a competing shroud. How is it going? And have you read and debunked Raymond Rogers’ 2005 peer reviewed and published paper on the carbon dating of the Shroud of Turin?.
